name: WORMHOLE (angelwalia)
description:
Under Attack! SOS!

In a far away solar system an astronaut is under attack by deranged creatures. 
Take Control! Don't be fooled by their cute appearances. Use the wormholes and keep him alive for as long as possible. You get only 3 chances.

Disclaimer- While most of the visuals are from free graphic resources, we own no audio content. 

GH-41-> Angel Walia, Mayank Jain, Prakhar Goel, Varnika Kairon, Aayush Gupta
